describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

cell_morphology.description: Features relating to the morphology of cells in a biomaterial.

growth_conditions.description: Features relating to the growth and/or maintenance of a biomaterial.

genus_species.description: The scientific binomial name for the species of the biomaterial.

model_for_organ.description: Organ for which this organoid is a model system.

model_organ_part.description: Organ part for which this organoid is a model system.

organoid_age.description: Age of the organoid starting from the day cell aggregates started differentiating to desired organoid model.

organoid_age_unit.description: The unit in which organoid age is expressed. Must be one of hour, day, week, month, or year.

organoid_size_unit.description: The unit in which the organoid size is expressed.

organoid_morphology.description: General description of the organoid morphology.
organoid_morphology.example: Epithelial monolayer with budding crypt-like domains.

organoid_type.description: The type of organoid. Must be one of primary, immortalized, stem cell-derived, or synthetic.

embedded_in_matrigel.description: Whether an organoid is embedded in a matrigel.

organoid_growth_environment.description: Growth environment in which the organoid is grown in.

input_aggregate_cell_count.description: Estimated number of cells per input cell aggregate.

organoid_stored_oxygen_levels.description: Percent oxygen level organoid was stored in prior to sequencing.
